.

An order of adjudication was passed on 4th July

.

The pro-rata preferential dividend of Rs.0.18

ps.

in

a

rupee

was declared on th December, to

the

Preferential

Creditors

At

present, a

cash

balance

of

Rs.7030.48

ps.

and

Rs.13105/-

is

invested

in

Fixed

Deposit

Thus, total amount lying in the hands of Official

Assignee

in

the

estate

account

is

Rs.20,135.48

ps.

whereas

the proved preferential liability is Rs.27,314.88

ps. and unsecured liability is Rs.4,45,918.72 ps. No

further recoveries are possible.

.

The Official Assignee has sought permission to

declare further pro-rata preferential dividend on Proved

Preferential Liability.

:2:

.

Having regard to the circumstances set out in the

report

of

the Official Assignee, there is no reason

why

the

prayer

should not be granted.

Prayer clause (a)

of

the report of the Official Assignee is accordingly

granted.
